caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 92–95.
Nezara viridula
. 92: Dorsal view, scale bar = 1.0 mm. 93: Ventral view, showing abdominal spine (arrow). 94: Ventral view of lateral area of abdominal sternites, showing spiracles. 95: Distribution within Rio Grande do Sul.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution in Rio Grande do Sul .
Cachoeirinha, Canoas, Cruz Alta, Estrela, Guaíba, Passo Fundo, Rio Grande, Santa Maria and São Sepé ( Fig. 95 ).
Comments. In some specimens, the anterior half of pronotum and posterolateral margins of head are yellowish (see Garbelotto & Campos 2014 ).
